title: Lewndowski's Lingering Transfer Saga
description:
The FC crew discuss the lingering transfer saga of Robert Lewandowski as he returns preseason to training with Bayern Munich. Plus, Bayern potentially look to offload Leroy Sane to raise funds for Matthijs de Ligt, Edouard Mendy makes an odd comparison between Erling Haaland and Christian Benteke, and Granit Xhaka sits down with ESPN and discusses Arsenal's hopes after signing Gabriel Jesus.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Robert Lewandowski turn up to Bayern Munich training; Edouard Mendy's strange comments on Haaland; Arsenal and Tottenham's expectations next season
